conferences.name: International Conference on Machine Learning and Data Science (ICMLDS)
conferences.description: The ICMLDS is a premier conference for researchers and practitioners in the fields of machine learning and data science. The conference features keynote talks, oral presentations, and poster sessions.

conferences.name: International Conference on Cybersecurity (ICC)
conferences.description: The ICC is a leading conference on cybersecurity, featuring talks and workshops on a wide range of topics including network security, cloud security, and cryptography.

conferences.name: International Conference on Blockchain (ICB)
conferences.description: The ICB is a conference focused on blockchain technology and its applications. The conference features talks, demos, and workshops on topics such as smart contracts, decentralized finance, and supply chain management.

conferences.name: International Conference on Artificial Intelligence (ICAI)
conferences.description: The ICAI is a leading conference on artificial intelligence, featuring talks and workshops on a wide range of topics including machine learning, natural language processing, and robotics.

conferences.name: International Conference on Cloud Computing (ICCC)
conferences.description: The ICCC is a conference focused on cloud computing, featuring talks and workshops on topics such as cloud architecture, security, and cost optimization.

conferences.name: International Conference on DevOps (ICD)
conferences.description: The ICD is a conference focused on DevOps, featuring talks and workshops on topics such as continuous delivery, infrastructure as code, and testing.
